tool.name: cloneHD - Tool Input Prep

param.name: cnas
param.help: CNAs extracted from Battenberg file using cloneHD CNAs Prep

param.name: only_normal_cn
param.label: Only report CN regions
param.help: Only output variants lying in normal CN regions. Do not output CNA data directly.

tool.help:
- Second tool to be executed when using the PhyloWGS example.
- Extracts SSMs from a VCF file and formats CNVs from a CNV text file.
- More information on this tool can be found at https://github.com/morrislab/phylowgs/tree/master/parser under create_phylowgs_inputs.py
- Output from this tool will be used in PhyloWGS 3 - Tool
